group_1.narration: "With Touka and Nemu's help,@we were able to get in contact with Kurumi.@The three geniuses got straight to work@on sorting out the situation."
"So basically, Café LycoReco@and Mikazuki Villa have been swapped...@Now they exist in totally different worlds...@I don't want to believe it."

group_1.textLeft: But there's no Kamihama City in your world,@correct?
Apparently you're a genius, but you can only see@things through the veil of common knowledge.
How disappointing.

group_1.narration: "Look, I specialize in cyber warfare.@I'm a completely different brand@of genius than the two of you."

"But even setting aside the fact that@Kamihama City, where you live, doesn't exist here,@there are just too many differences between us...@I don't want to believe in otherworldly travel,@but there's no other way to explain all this..."

group_1.textLeft: [chara:406101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Eh? You mean we REALLY got isekaied?

group_1.textRight: …You've been saying that since the very start,@Chisato.

group_1.textLeft: I just thought it'd be funny, but they're saying@it's serious.

group_1.textRight: Still, there are so many unknowns@in the universe.
Just as well, we can't say we're certain this is@what’s happening… It's just a possibility.

group_1.textLeft: …So will we be able to go home?

group_1.textRight: Hmm… What do you think, Kurumi?

group_1.narration: "Thanks to that [textBlue:Rumor] or whatever,@we were able to communicate...@So if Touka, Nemu and I work together,@maybe we can manage something."

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* As she said, Nemu.

group_1.textRight: I think just the same…@[chara:101471:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101471:cheek_0][chara:101471:face_mtn_ex_011.exp3.json][chara:101471:lipSynch_1]*Chuckle*
Well then, let's get to work. For the rest of you,@I need you to help investigate something.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:406101:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Woohoo! We get to be normal students!

group_1.textRight: …We're not here to play around.@We're conducting an investigation.

group_1.textLeft: Hmph! Don't be so dull, Takinaaa…
Still, Kurumi really is something…

group_1.textCenter: Yeah…she's a hacker, right? That's how she got@them both enrolled in our school.

group_1.textRight: Alright, here's what I need you to investigate.
Most problems of this nature involve [textBlue:Rumors].
While I doubt that any [textBlue:Rumors] have materialized,@we can't be certain that none exist.
Therefore, I would like you all to conduct@an investigative survey.
A survey… We can certainly do that.@It's surprisingly classic, though.

group_1.textLeft: Since we don't have DA hanging over our@shoulder, why don't we make this fun?
Like…going undercover at a school!

group_1.textRight: Chisato… This is no time for games…
Actually, as [textBlue:Rumors] are the subject here,@infiltrating a school is quite appropriate.

group_1.textLeft: Eh?

group_1.textRight: Youth tend to be drawn to rumors by their@very nature.

group_1.textLeft: That said, infiltration won't be easy without@DA's support…

group_1.narration: "Oh hey!@Kamihama University Affiliated School,@the place Iroha and some others here attend,@is open to accepting a couple of students@for a few days to attend classes."

group_1.textRight: …What on earth did you do?

group_1.narration: "*Giggle* Trade secret. Like I said,@I'm a different brand of genius than you guys.@Don't worry about it, no one got hurt.@And I'll clean up everything afterwards."

group_1.textLeft: Yaaay! I get to have the school life I've been@dreaming of!
Okay, I have to go this way. I'm off!

group_1.textRight: Same here! Let's meet up after school!
You two are in my class, so let's head over@together.

group_1.textLeft: Okay! I can't wait for high school life~!

group_1.textRight: Er…um…actually, we're middle schoolers…

group_1.textLeft: [chara:406101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ehh?! You mean you're not in high school?!
…So I guess that means we can't have the fun@and free high school life?!

group_1.narration: "The middle school was the only one@I could conveniently get you guys into.@And hey, you're about that age mentally,@plus you've got Iroha there to babysit."

group_1.textLeft: Figures. I guess there's no other way…

group_1.textRight: …That reminds me, are you able to see this,@Kurumi?

group_1.narration: "Yeah, thanks to those little@communicators you guys are wearing,@we can chat from where we are.@And since I can see the video from here,@I should be able to follow along a bit."
"But since you guys don't really need me here,@I'll pretty much be on call with Touka and Nemu@while we figure out how to get you guys home."

group_1.textLeft: Thanks, Kurumi!@And how are the others?

group_1.narration: "Hm? Well, I don't know if it's@because they can't make coffee,@or if it's that you two aren't here,@but everyone seems kinda lethargic.@Well, Mizuki's the same as always."

group_1.textLeft: Huh? What? They miss us...

group_1.narration: "Incidentally, the customers are sad since@Café LycoReco can't be open for business.@That manga artist is wailing about how she@can't make any progress on her manuscript."
"Meanwhile, trying to explain this@isekai stuff to DA is way too complicated,@so Mika's been trying to run interference.@But for everyone's sake, we better get@you guys home as soon as we can."

group_1.textLeft: I knooow…

group_1.textRight: …Who's Mika?

group_1.textLeft: The manager of Café LycoReco.@And perhaps you could say our guardian.

group_1.textRight: So she's like what Yachiyo is to Mikazuki…?

group_1.textLeft: …Oh dear, I think Yachiyo would chew you out@big time if you made that comparison.
The name often trips people up,
but Mika is actually a man.

group_1.textRight: Eh? Ah…I thought he was a woman!

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* Called it, right?
We better get going for now.@If you may, Iroha.

group_1.textRight: Ah, yes! Miss Chisato, Miss Takina, I'm looking@forward to working with you!

group_1.textLeft: No no no! There's no need to be so formal.@We're classmates, after all!

group_1.textRight: Yes... No, I mean...@[chara:100101:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:100101:cheek_0][chara:100101:face_mtn_ex_011.exp3.json][chara:100101:lipSynch_1]Yeah!

group_1.textLeft: Perfect! Alrighty then, let's go!@Let the undercover operation begin!
